name: Shooting Star: No return
description:
Controls:

Accelerate/Decelerate: W/S

Left/Right propeller: A/D

Left/ Right cannon: Q/E

Main Laser: Left Click

Turbo Sprint: Shift

Stabilizer: Space Bar

You have to survive between mines, enemy ship and asteroids while every part of your ship keeps breaking down. Collect as many points as you can.
